verses.verse: God<WG2316>, who at sundry times<WG4181> and<WG2532> in various manners<WG4187> spoke<WG2980> in time past<WG3819> to the fathers<WG3962> by<WG1722> the prophets<WG4396>,

But<WG1161> to<WG4314> the Son<WG5207> he says<WG4675>, Your throne<WG2362>, O God<WG2316>, is for<WG1519> ever<WG165> and ever<WG165>: a scepter<WG4464> of righteousness<WG2118> is the scepter<WG4464> of<WG932> your<WG4675> kingdom<WG932>.
